function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Estimation of cumulative infections in no-policy scenario","Impact":"Increased number of COVID-19 infections in various countries","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective anti-contagion policies and measures","Technologies":"Data analysis, modeling, policy deployment","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainties in the estimates","Impact":"Potential underestimation or overestimation of the impact of policies","Mitigation":"Conducting sensitivity tests, improving data collection and analysis methods","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data analysis, data validation","People":"Data analysts, researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Susceptible-infected-removed model based on estimated case-detection rates","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of susceptible population and infection rates","Mitigation":"Improving case-detection methods, validating model assumptions","Technologies":"Econometric modeling, data analysis, case-detection technology","People":"Data analysts, researchers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
